name: numerica
description: ðŸ”¢ A useful number formatting library for frontend developers.

scripts.lint: eslint src --fix --max-warnings=0 && echo No linting issues found.
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:generate && echo numerica.js.org > docs/CNAME && git add docs && git diff --cached --quiet || (git commit -m "docs: update documentation" && git push)
scripts.release:patch: npm run compile && npm run docs:generate && echo numerica.js.org > docs/CNAME && git add . && git commit -m "prep: commit files before release" && npm version patch -m "v%s - patch release"
scripts.release:minor: npm run compile && npm run docs:generate && echo numerica.js.org > docs/CNAME && git add . && git commit -m "prep: commit files before release" && npm version minor -m "v%s - minor release"
scripts.release:major: npm run compile && npm run docs:generate && echo numerica.js.org > docs/CNAME && git add . && git commit -m "prep: commit files before release" && npm version major -m "v%s - major release"
scripts.publish:all: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
